fetter.title: Dark Side of Dawn
fetter.detail: The tycoon of a winery empire in Mondstadt, unmatched in every possible way.

nameCard.name: Diluc: Flames
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\nMaster Crepus painted many eagles during his lifetime, but he never could've foreseen creating an eagle with such fire.

0.name: Normal Attack: Tempered Sword
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes.
At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

1.name: Searing Onslaught
1.description: Performs a forward slash that deals Pyro DMG. This skill can be consecutively used 3 times. Enters CD if not cast again within a short period. The slashes represent the values that Diluc holds dear: one for justice, one for courage, and one for duty.

3.name: Dawn
3.description: Releases intense flames to knock back nearby opponents, dealing Pyro DMG. The flames then converge into the weapon, summoning a Phoenix that flies forward and deals massive Pyro DMG to all opponents in its path. The Phoenix explodes upon reaching its destination, causing a large amount of AoE Pyro DMG. The searing flames that run down his blade cause it to be infused with Pyro. The only reason to walk in the darkness is to light it up. Behold, that fleeing light in the dead of night is the herald of the coming dawn.

4.name: Relentless
4.description: Diluc's Charged Attack Stamina Cost is decreased by 50%, and its duration is increased by 3s.

5.name: Blessing of Phoenix
5.description: The <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro Infusion</color> provided by <color=#FFD780FF>Dawn</color> lasts for 4s longer. Additionally, Diluc gains 20% <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG Bonus</color> during the duration of this effect.

6.name: Tradition of the Dawn Knight
6.description: Refunds 15% of the ore used when crafting Claymore-type weapons.

0.name: Conviction
0.description: Diluc deals 15% more DMG to opponents whose HP is above 50%.

1.name: Searing Ember
1.description: When Diluc takes DMG, his ATK increases by 10% and his ATK SPD increases by 5%. Lasts for 10s.\nThis effect can stack up to 3 times and can only occur once every 1.5s.

2.name: Fire and Steel
2.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Searing Onslaught</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: Flowing Flame
3.description: Casting <color=#FFD780FF>Searing Onslaught</color> in rhythm greatly increases damage dealt.\n2s after casting <color=#FFD780FF>Searing Onslaught</color>, casting the next Searing Onslaught in the combo deals 40% additional DMG. This effect lasts for 2s.

4.name: Phoenix, Harbinger of Dawn
4.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Dawn</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: Flaming Sword, Nemesis of the Dark
5.description: After casting <color=#FFD780FF>Searing Onslaught</color>, the next 2 Normal Attacks within the next 6s will have their DMG and ATK SPD increased by 30%.\nAdditionally, Searing Onslaught will not interrupt the Normal Attack combo.
